tethys.SpatialDownscaling.TotalWaterUse¶

@Date: 09/09/2017 @author: Xinya Li (xinya.li@pnl.gov) @Project: Tethys V1.0

License: BSD 2-Clause, see LICENSE and DISCLAIMER files Copyright (c) 2017, Battelle Memorial Institute

1. Add agriculture, livestock, and non-agriculture water withdrawal into one withdrawal map withd_nonAg_map, OUT.wdirr, OUT.wdliv have no nan

  1. Output downscaled results by region and time

  2. Perform the conversion from km3/yr to the output unit

Functions

TotalWaterUse(Settings, GISData, rgnmapData, OUT)
